item.title: By: EmGreenbeanz
item.dc:creator: EmGreenbeanz
item.description: I got this helmet with my hoverboard. So far it seems sturdy and looks good. Great value for the price.
item.content:encoded: I got this helmet with my hoverboard. So far it seems sturdy and looks good. Great value for the price.

item.title: By: grace w.
item.dc:creator: grace w.
item.description: Got a medium. It's a little big, but there's a knob in the back that lets you adjust it
item.content:encoded: Got a medium. It’s a little big, but there’s a knob in the back that lets you adjust it

item.title: By: D_808
item.dc:creator: D_808
item.description: Fits well and the helmet isn't heavy.
item.content:encoded: Fits well and the helmet isn’t heavy.

item.title: By: imagineds
item.dc:creator: imagineds
item.description: No complaints from my daughter. She wears it without me telling her
item.content:encoded: No complaints from my daughter. She wears it without me telling her

item.title: By: kaybee33
item.dc:creator: kaybee33
item.description: Solid product. Took one star off because I wish there where more colors to pick from but the helmet is good
item.content:encoded: Solid product. Took one star off because I wish there where more colors to pick from but the helmet is good

item.title: By: Jony Y.

item.description: My kids do everything and its nice to have one helmet that does it all
item.content:encoded: My kids do everything and its nice to have one helmet that does it all

item.title: By: HaMonie
item.dc:creator: HaMonie
item.description: Helmet is well made and the pink version is super cute.
item.content:encoded: Helmet is well made and the pink version is super cute.
